briefdescription.para: CFS Video Control (VC) application entry point.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: CFS Video control application entry point. This function performs app initialization, custom transmit and device initialization, and starts streaming in a child task.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: If there is an unrecoverable failure during initialization the main loop is never executed and the application will exit. An error includes all initialization but excludes "start streaming". If streaming fails to start VC will not exit and will indicate an initialized state.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the CFS Video Control (VC) application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Video Control application initialization routine. This function performs all the required startup steps to initialize VC data structures, custom device resources, and custom transmit resources, and start streaming video. Init also registers the applications with the cFE services so it can begin to receive command messages and send events.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup initialize the cFE Software Bus message pipes and subscribe to messages for the VC application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Video Control (VC) critical cleanup prior to exit.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function handles any critical cleanup prior to application exit.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Video Control (VC) cleanup prior to exit.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function handles any necessary cleanup prior to application exit.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize Event Services and Event tables.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to setup cFE Event Services for use by the VC application.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Initialize global variables used by VC application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function performs the steps required to initialize the VC application data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

briefdescription.para: Receive and process software bus messages.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming SB messages and routes messages to the appropriete helper function to process commands or report housekeeping etc.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: timeOut CFE_SB_PEND, CFE_SB_POLL or millisecond timeout

briefdescription.para: Video Control Task incoming command processing.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes incoming commands subscribed by VC application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function processes command messages specific to the VC application

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None

parameterdescription.para: A CFE_SB_Msg_t pointer that references the software bus message
